title: 'Soft and fluffy'
body: 'Very soft and durable pillow. Fibre quantity is good. Nice for neck pain as it is not so thin and not so hard. Very soft and fluffy. Great product.'

title: 'Comfortable'
body: This microfiber pillow is so comfy and plush. I hope you get to try it soon it's softness, comfort and size is looks like the perfect combination for a cozy and restful sleep!

title: 'Nice'
body: I am using this product last 1 week.. it's a good product quality.. very comfortable.. nice packing on this price range.. value for money... very soft pillow...

title: 'Soft and comfortable'
body: 'Very nice pillow in this price range. Stuffing is good. Very soft and comfortable. Not too thin not too fluffy. Good for neck pain'

title: 'Pillow'

title: 'Dont buy it'
body: 'The pillow on arrival seems decent but on just 3 days of use it goes flat and stuffing inside goes away from the center and makes it uneven to sleep got few neck sprains with this pillow and replaced it later'
